Scooters wi__ motors a__ called mo___ scooters. There a__ many diff_____ kinds o_ scooters. They include motor scooters and kick scooters.
data.fullContent: A scooter is a bicycle or tricycle with very small wheels. Some scooters have a motor, some have pedals, and some are pushed with the foot. Scooters with motors are called motor scooters. There are many different kinds of scooters. They include motor scooters and kick scooters.
data.answer: 小型摩托车是轮子很小的自行车或三轮车。有些小型摩托车有马达，有些有踏板，有些是用脚推的。带马达的小型摩托车叫做机动摩托车。有许多不同种类的摩托车。它们包括机动摩托车和踏板车。
